generatedSources.name: #utility.yul

deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
@title Lender
 @dev Allows people to borrow money from a lender.
@dev Solidity does not supports natively the removal of a specific index. This methods safely do that in only two instructions.
@dev Can be called to fund the contract by providing value in the transaction
@dev Can be called to retrieve funds from the contract to the owner
@dev Used to generate a unique id for each new Lend
@dev Allow someone to request a loan
@dev Allow the contract owner to accept a loan, transfers funds to the borrower if so
@dev Allow the contract owner to deny a loan
@dev This function can find a specific request id in the requestIds array. Used to find if a request exists and if so, its position.
@dev Can be called by a borrower to repay its lend. Borrower must provide funds when calling this function.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256) pure returns (struct Lender.Loan memory[] memory)

attributes.text:
@title Lender
 @dev Allows people to borrow money from a lender.
@dev Solidity does not supports natively the removal of a specific index. This methods safely do that in only two instructions.
@dev Can be called to fund the contract by providing value in the transaction
@dev Can be called to retrieve funds from the contract to the owner
@dev Used to generate a unique id for each new Lend
@dev Allow someone to request a loan
@dev Allow the contract owner to accept a loan, transfers funds to the borrower if so
@dev Allow the contract owner to deny a loan
@dev This function can find a specific request id in the requestIds array. Used to find if a request exists and if so, its position.
@dev Can be called by a borrower to repay its lend. Borrower must provide funds when calling this function.

attributes.type: function (uint256) pure returns (struct Lender.Loan memory[] memory)

devdoc.details: Allows people to borrow money from a lender.

acceptLoan(uint256).details: Allow the contract owner to accept a loan, transfers funds to the borrower if so

denyLoan(uint256).details: Allow the contract owner to deny a loan

fundContract().details: Can be called to fund the contract by providing value in the transaction

getContractFunds(uint256).details: Can be called to retrieve funds from the contract to the owner

repayLoan(uint256).details: Can be called by a borrower to repay its lend. Borrower must provide funds when calling this function.

requestLoan(uint256).details: Allow someone to request a loan
